attributes.action: To explain where the extra charges made to air passengers is going or is it just another 'stealth tax'?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As I understand it extra charges have been introduced now to passengers on both internal & international flights made from the UK, Where is this extra revenue going? Will it go directly towards research into better fuels & more efficient engines or is it just another tax going into the big Government pot for all to dip into?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
